Absolutely.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: lori bogren 
  To: evp=
-itc@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, April 11, 2009 9:19 PM
  Subject: R=
E: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing





  April~
   
  Ever consider developi=
ng your psychic abilities?
   
  ~Lori




  "My life is boring, my fantasi=
es are a theme park." 
  --Anne Rice  Responding to an interviewer who just=
 did not get it. 

   




------------------------------------------------=
------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  From: april@=
abercrombieghostresearch.com
  Date: Sat, 11 Apr 2009 19:32:46 -0600
  Subj=
ect: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing


  .


   

  It would have to pres=
ent consistent results first. Then I would trust it...to a point. I could n=
ever be 100% sure and that is fine by me.

  So in the end, it really doesn=
't matter. I would be happy just knowing that I have proven to myself that =
I am conversing with a sentient being.

    ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
   From: lori bogren 
    To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, =
April 11, 2009 6:03 PM
    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing


   =
 April~
     
    So my next question would be, how do you know it wouldn't=
 be "prankster".  Providing accurate information until a personal question =
about itself was asked and then mislead?
     
    ~Lori
    PS:  Did I tel=
l you there's a running joke amongst my friends about my paranoia?  :)




=
    "My life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
    --Anne Rice  R=
esponding to an interviewer who just did not get it. 



      




-------=
---------------------------------------------------------------------
    T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    From: april@...
   =
 Date: Sat, 11 Apr 2009 16:55:22 -0600
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Boa=
rd Testing





    I would try it both ways -solo and with another person.=
 However I would limit it to just me and one other trustworthy person.


  =
  "How would you go about determining/verified whether it's a ghost (someon=
e stuck in between life and the other side), a spirit (someone that's cross=
ed over and came back to say high) and some other type of entity?"

    Onl=
y after establishing that I am indeed communicating with a spirit, and that=
 spirit has given me trustworthy info consistently, at that point I would s=
imply ask what it's nature is.

    April
